author: Jessica Gorst-Williams
title: 'I'm still waiting for my £800 npower credit'
text: More than five months ago npower agreed to return £870 owed to me out of the £1,040 credit on my electricity account. I was advised then that it would take a month to implement. I am still waiting and growing increasingly vexed about this. Can you please help? WE, Yorks When I approached npower it immediately acknowledged that the service you had received was unacceptable. It now calculated the charges up to date and refunded the full £553 of credit that was due. However, it increased your monthly payment amount in line with a recent increase in use. • 'When will I get my £200 credit from ScottishPower?' • 'I haven't had a correct bill in 18 months' This turns out to have been explained by you turning on your underfloor heating for a short time while you were having trouble with the boiler. Now usage is back to its old levels the monthly payment has been revised down again. You tell me that all this has been getting to you a bit.
